item.title: Binance Alpha has now launched Aspecta (ASP)
item.description: On July 24th, Binance Alpha has now introduced Aspecta (ASP).

item.title: Gate Launchpad will list Ika (IKA), supporting USD1 and GT subscriptions
item.description: On July 24th, as per the official announcement, Gate Launchpad is set to launch Ika (IKA) from 13:00 on July 26th, 2025, to 13:00 on July 29th, 2025 (in UTC+8 time). Users will be able to participate in the IKA token sale by using USD1 and GT. The subscription price is 0.025 USD1, and the total subscription amount is 200 million IKA.The GT subscription price will be determined based on the opening average price of GT on July 24th, 25th, and 26th (in UTC+8 time), and will be announced 2 hours prior to the start of the subscription. The maximum token amount per person is 2,000,000 IKA, and the distribution will be completed within 4 hours after the end of the subscription.Meanwhile, Gate will list the Ika (IKA) spot trading on July 29th, 2025, at 18:00 (in UTC+8 time), opening the IKA/USD1 trading pair. In addition, Gate Launchpad has launched a newcomer event from now until August 1st, 2025, at 00:00 (in UTC+8 time). During this period, registration and trading can share 2,000 GT, and

item.title: SlowMist: Core Administrator of the world's largest dark web crime platform XSS arrested
item.description: On July 24th, according to the Chief Information Security Officer of SlowMist Technology, 23pds. The core administrator of the world's largest dark web crime platform, XSS, was arrested. This platform has been operating on the dark web for a long time and is one of the main trading hubs for Stealer tools (information stealers) targeting the cryptocurrency industry.The suspect has been active for approximately 20 years and has earned 7 million euros through cybercrime. The operation was led by France and received support from Europol.

item.title: Analysis: US Dollar's Unusual Movement or Another Reason for Powell's Caution on Rate Cuts
item.description: July 24th: According to foreign media analysis, under the influence of tariff policies, Federal Reserve Chairman Powell insisted on waiting for more evidence of stable inflation before cutting interest rates. Another reason for Powell's need to be cautious is the extremely unusual behavior of the US dollar.Before the announcement of the tariff policy, the market generally expected that tariffs would strengthen the US dollar. But in reality, the US dollar has depreciated. Since "Liberation Day" on April 2nd, the dollar index has fallen by 6.8%. Year-to-date, as of 2025, it has fallen by about 10.4%, making it the worst-performing year at least in 25 years. The sustained weakness of the US dollar is more likely to have a significant impact on the economy (including consumer prices). (FXStreet)

item.title: Japanese publicly traded company Convano increased its Bitcoin holdings by 79.92 BTC this week.
item.description: July 24th: The publicly-listed Japanese company and nail salon operator Convano Inc has officially initiated its Bitcoin treasury strategy and purchased 79.92 BTC this week.BlockBeats previously reported that on July 17th, Convano Inc (6574.T) officially began its Bitcoin financial strategy and planned to acquire BTC worth 400 million yen (approximately $2.7 million) in July.

item.title: HTX DeepThink: Bitcoin Gathers Strength in Consolidation Phase, Japanese Political Situation and Tariff Negotiation Progress May Determine Short-term Direction
item.description: July 24th. According to the analysis in the HTX DeepThink column, Bitcoin surged to as high as $121,800 yesterday and then retreated to around $118,000 for consolidation. On-chain data indicates that the average market chip profit margin has reached 57%, and due to short-term selling pressure, the upside potential is limited.Currently, Bitcoin is gathering strength while waiting for directional signals. Two major catalytic factors to pay attention to are: profit-taking and macroeconomic clarity. The turmoil in the Japanese political situation may affect the progress of the August US-Japan tariff negotiation. Although the EU and the US have postponed tariffs for the time being, they are struggling to ease global uncertainty. The CME BTC futures positions remain high, the inflow of stablecoins is slowing down, and funds are mostly in a wait-and-see state.It is expected that BTC will fluctuate in the range of $115,000 to $123,000 in the short term, and early August will be a key decis

item.title: Brazilian lawmakers will debate the 17.5% cryptocurrency tax proposal put forward by the president on August 6.
item.description: On July 24th, according to BTCTN, Brazilian lawmakers are in the process of preparing to hold a debate on a newly proposed cryptocurrency taxation plan put forward by President Lula.This proposal intends to impose a flat 17.5% tax on all cryptocurrency transactions, and a hearing has been scheduled for August 6th.

item.title: Publicly traded company Satsuma has completed a funding round exceeding ￡100 million, aiming to accelerate its Bitcoin accumulation strategy.
item.description: On July 24th, the UK-listed company Satsuma Technology PLC (formerly known as Tao Alpha PLC) announced that it had successfully raised significantly over ￡100 million.The company's Chief Bitcoin Strategy Officer, Mark Moss, said: "We are extremely grateful for the strong market support demonstrated by this successful fundraising, which has exceeded our ￡100 million target. This attests to the UK market's confidence in Satsuma's strategic direction and the execution capabilities of our leadership team. With this expanded capital base, we anticipate providing a platform in London to drive the future development of decentralized infrastructure, expedite our Bitcoin accumulation strategy, and enhance our role in promoting institutional Bitcoin adoption in Europe."It was previously reported by BlockBeats that on July 14th, the UK-listed company Tao Alpha announced its first purchase of 28.56 BTC.

item.title: Lido's market share in the Ethereum staking market has dropped to 25.02%, the lowest since March 2022.
item.description: On July 24th, based on Dune Analytics, Lido's share in the Ethereum staking market has decreased to 25.02%, which is the lowest level since March 2022.

item.title: SenseTime Plans to Raise HKD 2.5 Billion, Funds to Be Used for RWA, Stablecoin, and Digital Asset Businesses
item.description: On July 24th, SenseTime announced that on July 23rd (after the trading hours of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange), the company placed 1.667 billion subscription shares. The expected total placement amount is approximately 2.5 billion Hong Kong dollars. After deducting placement agent fees and other related expenses, the net proceeds from the placement are approximately 2.498 billion Hong Kong dollars. The subscriber in this placement is the international long-term capital Infini Capital.The proceeds from this round of placement will mainly be used to support the company's core business development. This includes building an industry-leading AI cloud and continuously expanding the scale and scene coverage of the AI infrastructure SenseTime Data Center. It also involves exploring the technical integration and practical application of artificial intelligence in innovative vertical fields, such as implementing embodied intelligent robots, blockchain, real-world assets (RWA), digital assets,
